org.simplity.kernel.dm

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.kernel.dm.Field

  • public class Field
extends Object
    Represents a basic unit of data. Like unitPrice, dateOfBirth. This is used in different contexts, like a column of a table, a filed in a page etc..

      • getName

        public String getName()
        let us have a public identity
        Returns:
        name of this field. Unique within a record, but can be duplicate across records

        Returns:
